attributes.action: General Dental Council must protect registrars
attributes.additional_details: The GDC only answers to the government
attributes.background: The general dentists in England are left unprotected against coronavirus by the GDC, the government needs to force GDC to take actions

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the NHS has advised all dental practices to stop and defer all routine, non-urgent dental care: https://www.england.nhs.uk/coronavirus/wp-content/uploads/sites/52/2020/03/issue-3-preparedness-letter-for-primary-dental-care-25-march-2020.pdf

Public Health England has also published new guidance about personal protective equipment: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/wuhan-novel-coronavirus-infection-prevention-and-control/covid-19-personal-protective-equipment-ppe

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
